entry.tran: （美国南部、尤指路易斯安那州的）牛轭湖，长沼
entry.def: A bayou is a slow-moving, marshy area of water in the southern United States, especially Louisiana.

means.word_mean: 1. a swampy arm or slow-moving outlet of a lake (term used mainly in Mississippi and Louisiana)
